content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here you will discover the delivery side of People Programs - People Technology Portfolio as a part of EPAM Digital Platform and, more widely, EPAM BSS.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":271629,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/87e7f878-5309-4296-b34b-9a41f4d1a575/MicrosoftTeams-image.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/87e7f878-5309-4296-b34b-9a41f4d1a575/MicrosoftTeams-image.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image.png\",\"name\":\"MicrosoftTeams-image.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"87e7f878-5309-4296-b34b-9a41f4d1a575\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":536,\"height\":424},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
